title: Justin Bieber Gets Country on ‘10,000 Hours’ with Dan + Shay
text:
Dan + Shay + Justin released an “icon video” (a lyric video where the bathroom icons fall in love) for their song “10,000 Hours.” According to Malcolm Gladwell, 10,000 hours is how long it takes to become an expert at anything. In this case, the thing you’re becoming an expert at is being a committed partner. Speaking of committed partners, Justin Bieber had his reweddening September 30 in South Carolina. Dan and Shay are also married, but they already did a song about their weddings. So we can assume this one is 100% about Hailey. Just kidding, it’s definitely about the bathroom sign couple.

Related
description: Justin Bieber and country duo Dan + Shay released a joint sing, “10,000 Hours.” According to Malcolm Gladwell, 10,000 hours is how long you have to practice something to master it, and these boys will master committed partnership.
